title: RNA-seq analysis of chemotherapy resistance in esophageal squamous cell carcinoma
summary: Esophageal cancer presents significant challenges due to limited treatment options and poor prognosis, particularly in advanced stages. Dysregulated long non-coding RNAs (lncRNAs) are implicated in cancer progression and treatment resistance. This study investigated the roles of dysregulated lncRNA, identified through lncRNA-seq, and its downstream target gene  in esophageal squamous cell carcinoma（ESCC).
